Detailed Description

Set Http proxy.

Use getInstance() to obtain process-wide ProxyManager.

  ProxyManager::getInstance()->setHttpProxy("socks4://proxy.host");

Member Function Documentation

gaia::base::String gaia::net::ProxyManager::getHttpProxy ( ) const

Obtain Http Proxy of this ProxyManager.

Returns:
Proxy setting in URI format. Empty string means that connection is made directly.

ProxyManager for this process.

void gaia::net::ProxyManager::setHttpProxy ( const gaia::base::String &  httpProxy)

Set Http Proxy to this ProxyManager.

Parameters:
httpProxyProxy in URI format, like "socks4://proxy.host:port". Empty string makes every request sent to server directly.
